fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Create an arc between two players, transporting them silently.
- Create an angle between two players, redirecting visits to your first target to your second target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immunity
- Redirect Immunity
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
